name: Erayobi
description:
Currently in development • Demo available now!

"They say extraordinary things can happen here in Aikure.
But extraordinary things don't happen to ordinary people."

Shana Masako is your typical high school girl—she watches anime, reads manga, plays gacha on her phone, and hasn't a clue what to do with her life. There's just one thing unusual about her: she's cursed by a fox that enjoys playing tricks on her. So, when she runs into the handsome Inato Fudami one morning, it's a far cry from the life-changing encounter she's read of in shoujo manga.

With the help of a disgruntled transfer student, a kindly childhood friend, and a mischievous fox that doesn't exist, guide Shana in this coming-of-age otome visual novel that blurs the boundary between slice-of-life and imagination.

  • Length: 50,000 words (projected)
  • Reexperience the lighthearted joy of your first otome or shoujo.
  • Will you pursue the mysterious transfer student Inato, or your kind-hearted childhood friend Higa? Or will you choose the path of no romance at all?
  • Discover the dreams of Aikure's disillusioned youth, and learn the nature of the fox's curse.
